openid.description: Associate you with your personal info on Google

description: The PageSpeed Insights API lets you analyze the performance of your website with a simple API. It offers tailored suggestions for how you can optimize your site, and lets you easily integrate PageSpeed Insights analysis into your development tools and workflow.
name: pagespeedonline

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

runpagespeed.description: Runs PageSpeed analysis on the page at the specified URL, and returns PageSpeed scores, a list of suggestions to make that page faster, and other information.

captchaToken.description: The captcha token passed when filling out a captcha.

category.description: A Lighthouse category to run; if none are given, only Performance category will be run
enumDescriptions: Accessibility (a11y), category pertaining to a website's capacity to be accessible to all users.
Best Practices, category pertaining to a website's conformance to web best practice.
Performance, category pertaining to a website's performance.
Progressive Web App (PWA), category pertaining to a website's ability to be run as a PWA.
Search Engine Optimization (SEO), category pertaining to a website's ability to be indexed by search engines.

locale.description: The locale used to localize formatted results

strategy.description: The analysis strategy (desktop or mobile) to use, and desktop is the default
enumDescriptions: Fetch and analyze the URL for desktop browsers.
Fetch and analyze the URL for mobile devices.

url.description: Required. The URL to fetch and analyze

AuditRefs.description: A light reference to an audit by id, used to group and weight audits in a given category.

group.description: The category group that the audit belongs to (optional).

weight.description: The weight this audit's score has on the overall category score.

Bucket.description: A proportion of data in the total distribution, bucketed by a min/max percentage. Each bucket's range is bounded by min <= x < max, In millisecond.

max.description: Upper bound for a bucket's range.

min.description: Lower bound for a bucket's range.

proportion.description: The proportion of data in this bucket.

Categories.description: The categories in a Lighthouse run.

accessibility.description: The accessibility category, containing all accessibility related audits.

best-practices.description: The best practices category, containing all best practices related audits.

performance.description: The performance category, containing all performance related audits.

pwa.description: The Progressive-Web-App (PWA) category, containing all pwa related audits.

seo.description: The Search-Engine-Optimization (SEO) category, containing all seo related audits.

description.description: The description of what the category is grouping

title.description: The human readable title of the group

ConfigSettings.description: Message containing the configuration settings for the Lighthouse run.

channel.description: How Lighthouse was run, e.g. from the Chrome extension or from the npm module.

emulatedFormFactor.description: The form factor the emulation should use. This field is deprecated, form_factor should be used instead.

formFactor.description: How Lighthouse should interpret this run in regards to scoring performance metrics and skipping mobile-only tests in desktop.

onlyCategories.description: List of categories of audits the run should conduct.

Environment.description: Message containing environment configuration for a Lighthouse run.

benchmarkIndex.description: The benchmark index number that indicates rough device class.

hostUserAgent.description: The user agent string of the version of Chrome used.

networkUserAgent.description: The user agent string that was sent over the network.

I18n.description: Message containing the i18n data for the LHR - Version 1.

rendererFormattedStrings.description: Internationalized strings that are formatted to the locale in configSettings.

LighthouseAuditResultV5.description: An audit's result object in a Lighthouse result.

details.description: Freeform details section of the audit.

displayValue.description: The value that should be displayed on the UI for this audit.

errorMessage.description: An error message from a thrown error inside the audit.

explanation.description: An explanation of the errors in the audit.

numericValue.description: A numeric value that has a meaning specific to the audit, e.g. the number of nodes in the DOM or the timestamp of a specific load event. More information can be found in the audit details, if present.

score.description: The score of the audit, can be null.

warnings.description: Possible warnings that occurred in the audit, can be null.

auditRefs.description: An array of references to all the audit members of this category.

description.description: A more detailed description of the category and its importance.

id.description: The string identifier of the category.

manualDescription.description: A description for the manual audits in the category.

score.description: The overall score of the category, the weighted average of all its audits. (The category's score, can be null.)

title.description: The human-friendly name of the category.

audits.description: Map of audits in the LHR.

categories.description: Map of categories in the LHR.

categoryGroups.description: Map of category groups in the LHR.

configSettings.description: The configuration settings for this LHR.

environment.description: Environment settings that were used when making this LHR.

fetchTime.description: The time that this run was fetched.

finalUrl.description: The final resolved url that was audited.

i18n.description: The internationalization strings that are required to render the LHR.

lighthouseVersion.description: The lighthouse version that was used to generate this LHR.

runWarnings.description: List of all run warnings in the LHR. Will always output to at least `[]`.

runtimeError.description: A top-level error message that, if present, indicates a serious enough problem that this Lighthouse result may need to be discarded.

userAgent.description: The user agent that was used to run this LHR.

PagespeedApiLoadingExperienceV5.description: The CrUX loading experience object that contains CrUX data breakdowns.

id.description: The url, pattern or origin which the metrics are on.

initial_url.description: The requested URL, which may differ from the resolved "id".

origin_fallback.description: True if the result is an origin fallback from a page, false otherwise.

overall_category.description: The human readable speed "category" of the id.

analysisUTCTimestamp.description: The UTC timestamp of this analysis.

id.description: Canonicalized and final URL for the document, after following page redirects (if any).

lighthouseResult.description: Lighthouse response for the audit url as an object.

loadingExperience.description: Metrics of end users' page loading experience.

originLoadingExperience.description: Metrics of the aggregated page loading experience of the origin

version.description: The version of PageSpeed used to generate these results.

major.description: The major version number of PageSpeed used to generate these results.

minor.description: The minor version number of PageSpeed used to generate these results.

RendererFormattedStrings.description: Message holding the formatted strings used in the renderer.

auditGroupExpandTooltip.description: The tooltip text on an expandable chevron icon.

crcInitialNavigation.description: The label for the initial request in a critical request chain.

crcLongestDurationLabel.description: The label for values shown in the summary of critical request chains.

errorLabel.description: The label shown next to an audit or metric that has had an error.

errorMissingAuditInfo.description: The error string shown next to an erroring audit.

labDataTitle.description: The title of the lab data performance category.

lsPerformanceCategoryDescription.description: The disclaimer shown under performance explaning that the network can vary.

manualAuditsGroupTitle.description: The heading shown above a list of audits that were not computerd in the run.

notApplicableAuditsGroupTitle.description: The heading shown above a list of audits that do not apply to a page.

opportunityResourceColumnLabel.description: The heading for the estimated page load savings opportunity of an audit.

opportunitySavingsColumnLabel.description: The heading for the estimated page load savings of opportunity audits.

passedAuditsGroupTitle.description: The heading that is shown above a list of audits that are passing.

scorescaleLabel.description: The label that explains the score gauges scale (0-49, 50-89, 90-100).

toplevelWarningsMessage.description: The label shown preceding important warnings that may have invalidated an entire report.

varianceDisclaimer.description: The disclaimer shown below a performance metric value.

warningHeader.description: The label shown above a bulleted list of warnings.

RuntimeError.description: Message containing a runtime error config.

message.description: A human readable message explaining the error code.

iconDataURL.description: The stack pack icon data uri.

Timing.description: Message containing the performance timing data for the Lighthouse run.

total.description: The total duration of Lighthouse's run.

UserPageLoadMetricV5.description: A CrUX metric object for a single metric and form factor.

category.description: The category of the specific time metric.

distributions.description: Metric distributions. Proportions should sum up to 1.

formFactor.description: Identifies the form factor of the metric being collected.

median.description: The median number of the metric, in millisecond.

metricId.description: Identifies the type of the metric.

percentile.description: We use this field to store certain percentile value for this metric. For v4, this field contains pc50. For v5, this field contains pc90.

title: PageSpeed Insights API
